Pages.Need reasons to choose druid? Look no fu: Need reasons to choose druid? Look no further.
Pages.Built at Alibaba by <a href=\"http://git: Built at Alibaba by wenshao, Druid is no dependency with other jars, is compiled via Maven, and is managed through GitHub to help nerds do awesome stuff on the jdbc connection pool.
Pages.Druid was made to not only jdbc connecti: Druid was made to not only jdbc connection pool, but a built-in monitor service as well. see Druid monitor
Pages.A monitor service <a href=\"#\">Druid mo: A monitor service Druid monitor, SQL Parser, Proxy Druid can be used by your own.
Pages.License is important for contribution an: License is important for contribution and use? Make it happen.
Pages.This software is made available for use,: This software is made available for use, modification, and redistribution, under the terms of the Apache License, Version 2.0, which you should have received with this distribution.
Pages.Druid focus on JDBC connection pool, and: Druid focus on JDBC connection pool, and help developer monitor JDBC connection to maintain RDBMS related program.
Pages.Overview of the project, it's contents,: Overview of the project, it's contents, and how to get started with a simple peoject.
Pages.We know it can be hard to find the right: We know it can be hard to find the right help sometimes and search engines can be overwhelming, so we will try to put the most commonly asked for topics with some overview and links to more in-depth resources here for you to checkout, before wasting your time searching through our Documentation. If you're using qq, join this group: 92748305.
Pages.Show some examples for use druid. We enc: Show some examples for use druid. We encourage folks to iterate on these examples and not simply use them as an end result.
Pages.Monitors in web app, jconsole, command l: Monitors in web app, jconsole, command line and so on.
Pages.Some common questions concerning the his: Some common questions concerning the history, architecture and usage of Druid can be found on the FAQ page.
Pages.If you want to dive into the rabbit-hole: If you want to dive into the rabbit-hole (Hey, It's open source!), then checkout the Found a Bug page, which covers everything from posting questions to our mailing lists, to getting the source code and building it, and creating bug patches.....
Pages.Head to the docs for information, exampl: Head to the docs for information, examples, and code snippets, or take the next leap and customize Bootstrap for any upcoming project.
Pages.Use the links below to download a distri: Use the links below to download a distribution of Druid.
You can download from these places.

Pages.If you use linux, git clone is the best: If you use linux, git clone is the best way.
Pages.If you use Mac, go to <a href=\"http://m: If you use Mac, go to Github for Mac. then use it clone.
Pages.If you use Windows, go to <a href=\"http: If you use Windows, go to Github for Windows, then use it clone.
Pages.If you use Eclipse, go to <a href=\"http: If you use Eclipse, go to Github for Eclipse, then use it clone.
Pages.If you use Mobile, go to <a href=\"http:: If you use Mobile, go to Github for Mobile Apps, then use it clone.
Pages.These distributions are built and deploy: These distributions are built and deployed nightly, and contain up-to-date fixes and improvements. However, their stability cannot be guaranteed. Use at your own risk.
Pages.Snapshot builds for all active releases: Snapshot builds for all active releases are published to the Alibaba snapshot repository.
Pages.A maven project can access this snapshot: A maven project can access this snapshot repository by adding the following repository in pom.xml:
Pages.Older releases is not recommended, unles: Older releases is not recommended, unless you are certain you want to.
Pages.Druid older releases are hold at Github:: Druid older releases are hold at Github: https://github.com/AlibabaTech/druid/downloads.
Druid have no dependency for other jars.
Pages.Other help: Druid's command line monitor: Other help: Druid's command line monitor use Oracle's JDK package.
Pages.Head to the docs for information, exampl: Head to the docs for information, examples, and code snippets, or take the next leap and use Druid for any upcoming project.
Pages.This document provides technical details: This document provides technical details on the use of Druid.
Pages.Druid is a JDBC Component Library, inclu: Druid is a JDBC Component Library, include some function: JDBC Connection Pool, SQL Parser, Driver Proxy.
Pages.DruidDataSource is a monitorable and sca: DruidDataSource is a monitorable and scalable JDBC connection pool。
Pages.Can DruidDataSource make connected storm: Can DruidDataSource make connected storm happened?
Pages.The answer is no. When at interrupt reco: The answer is no. When at interrupt recovery of the database，DBCP directly due to the use of the current thread to create a physical connection, this will cause the connection to storm, in some cases, an application can instantly generate thousands of connections. DruidDataSource use "separate thread to create a connection", from the design to avoid the generation of connected storm.
Pages.How did DruidDataSource monitor connecti: How did DruidDataSource monitor connection leak?
Pages.When set the property \"ActiveConnection: When set the property "ActiveConnectionTraceEnable" to True，then the capable of being used in connection create a stack information obtained through ActiveConnectionStackTrace attributes, so that it is easy to find out the connection leaked code location.
Pages.DruidDataSource is the same as DruidProx: DruidDataSource is the same as DruidProxyDriver, support the same Filter-Chain mode extension mechanism makes it very convenient programming in JDBC layer extended.
Pages.Currently does not support XA, because t: Currently does not support XA, because the author not know enough about it, need to take the time to understand clearly. XA support has been added to the plan, the current plan implemented in version 0.2, please see JIRA.
Pages.Which the version of JDK did DruidProxyD: Which the version of JDK did DruidProxyDriver support?
Pages.DruidProxyDriver implement the JDBC 4.0: DruidProxyDriver implement the JDBC 4.0 Driver，over JDK 1.6 can use.
Pages.Oracle下jdbc executeBatch时，更新行数计算不正确?: Oracle下jdbc executeBatch时，更新行数计算不正确?
Pages.使用jdbc的executeBatch 方法，如果数据库为oracle，则无论是: 使用jdbc的executeBatch 方法，如果数据库为oracle，则无论是否成功更新到数据，返回值都是-2，而不是真正被sql更新到的记录数，这是Oracle JDBC Driver的问题，Druid不作特殊处理。
Pages.Druid如何自动根据URL自动识别DriverClass的?: Druid如何自动根据URL自动识别DriverClass的?
Pages.Druid是根据url前缀来识别DriverClass的，这样使得配置更方便简洁: Druid是根据url前缀来识别DriverClass的，这样使得配置更方便简洁。
Pages.DB2的JDBC Driver十分混乱，这个匹配不一定对: DB2的JDBC Driver十分混乱，这个匹配不一定对
Pages.不需要，在JDBC 4中，java.sql.DriverManager会自动读取:
不需要，在JDBC 4中，java.sql.DriverManager会自动读取META-INF/services/java.sql.Driver文件，读取其中配置过的Driver，DruidDriver支持这个特性，所以不需要使用前调用Class.forName("com.alibaba.druid.proxy.DruidDriver")。
META-INF/services/java.sql.Driver文件的内容如下，注册了两个Driver
